info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 08 at 5:25AM MDT until June 08 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY FOR WEST CENTRAL VALLEY COUNTY... At 525 AM MDT, Runoff from heavy rain is occurring across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams and highways as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hinsdale, Tampico, The Bentonite Plant and Vandalia. Additional rain is expected in the warning area this morning. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
